title: [Medicine] Biologic and Clinical Efficacy of LentiGlobin for Sickle Cell Disease | One-time treatment with LentiGlobin resulted in sustained production of HbAT87Q in most red cells, leading to reduced hemolysis and complete resolution of severe vaso-occlusive events
